course.subject: SOSC
course.name: City and Modernity
course.description: The course explores the theories, concepts and contradictions of urban modernity through an investigation of concrete cities in different times and places. It examines the development of the modern city including such varieties as the socialist, colonial and postcolonial city. It also considers the ways in which globalization affects urban space and urban cultures around the world. Enrolment is subject to the course instructorâ€™s approval.
